memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 3 items in this auction, with a total profit of $4600.:
  * Won Utensil N at $4500 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Gadget B at $1700 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $4500.:
  * Won Doodad D at $2500 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Appliance O at $5000 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 1 items in this auction, with a total profit of $2500.:
  * Won Contraption I at $3500 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 4 items in this auction, with a total profit of $12000.:
  * Won Mechanism J at $4900 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Machine P at $7000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Element R at $5050 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Widget A at $1050 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
